flyout_button.label: Communicate
flyout_button.name: communicate_btn
flyout_button.tool_tip: Communicate with your Friends and Groups.(Ctrl-T)

button.label: Communicate
button.name: communicate_im_btn
button.tool_tip: Communicate with your Friends and Groups.(Ctrl-T)

button.label: Radar
button.name: radar_list_btn
button.tool_tip: View a list of nearby avatars.(Ctrl-Shift-A)

button.label: Fly
button.name: fly_btn
button.tool_tip: Start flying(F or Home). Use E/C or PgUp/PgDn to fly up and down.

button.label: Snapshot
button.name: snapshot_btn
button.tool_tip: Save a screen shot to disk or inventory.(Ctrl-Shift-S for floater, Ctrl-`(~) takes snapshot w/o floater)

button.label: Search
button.name: directory_btn
button.tool_tip: Search for places, events, people, and more.(Ctrl-F)

button.label: Mini-Map
button.name: radar_btn
button.tool_tip: Map of the area around you. (Ctrl-Shift-M)

button.label: Memory Leak
button.name: memleak_btn
button.tool_tip: Dear Gawd, I hope you know what you're doing.

button.name: enable_joystick
button.tool_tip: Toggle Joystick controls on and off
